page.title: 03Shops
page.content: There are compact shops in the centre of the town.Most shops are situated along 4 main street.The types of shops in the town are shown in this table . Household 10% Supermarket 3% Food 18% Take away food 5% Clothes 13% Banks/offices 18% Specialist 33% The specialist shops include pet,motor accessory, stationery, chemist, hairdressers and electrical goods shops.Besides the banks there are solicitors, betting and building society offices.One supermarket is in an exclothing factory with an interesting parabolic roof.Another is a converted cinema and the third is squeezed into the High Street.Fish & chips and Chinese foods are available from the take away shops.
